name: George Washington Smith
bio: When George Washington Smith was born about 1824, in Georgia, United States, his father, Sidney A. Smith, was 25 and his mother, Rebecca Flinn, was 20. He married Sarah Jane Mann on 27 September 1846, in Muscogee, Georgia, United States. They were the parents of at least 5 sons and 2 daughters. He lived in Election Precinct 4 Clanton, Chilton, Alabama, United States in 1860 and Morgan, Georgia, United States in 1860. He died in 1862, at the age of 39.
